verses.roman:
miśrere namaskāra kare sammāna kariyā
nivedana kare kichu vinīta hañā

synonyms: miśrere—unto Pradyumna Miśra; namaskāra kare—offers respectful obeisances; sammāna kariyā—with all respect; nivedana kare—submitted; kichu—something; vinīta hañā—with great humility.
translation: He offered his obeisances to Pradyumna Miśra with all respect and then, with great humility, spoke as follows.
